body:
Comment 5: 
Thanks for the report.
Can you run your program under ktrace -i and then send the kdump -T output?
It is tempting to just widen the limits but really it seems like we
should be able to be more accurate than we are being.
I'd at least like to double-check that it is the system calls
causing the problem (by sleeping too much) and not a bug
in the Go runtime.

Thanks.
Russ
